attributes.action: merge the two high school lessons, music and drama into one lesson, Performing arts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This makes complete sense, it reduces our kids timetables, fills in the gaps of limited teachers (most schools in the UK use english teachers as drama ones because the lack of drama teachers). The two lessons are also conection and taught together in college and uni. This would also make our youth happier as some kids dont like music or drama, so if their together they could do the other.
